data.name: Modern Arena
data.detailed_description:
Horror Game Modern ARPG. Let's enjoy a MMO Style game.

We are receiving many inquiries about streaming or broadcasting in Youtube etc. We are permitting about that.

And please note that improvements are made steadily and will be continued for a long time.

Some Characters also are selled as DLC. You can currently use only male characters and female chars will be opened soon.

This game has Top down view and mouse click movement. I'll try to do many experimental things and many things about skills can be changed. Feel free to

experiment Modern and fantasic adventures.

1~6 are skill usage buttons.

Mouse click on the map moves the character.
data.about_the_game:
Horror Game Modern ARPG. Let's enjoy a MMO Style game.

We are receiving many inquiries about streaming or broadcasting in Youtube etc. We are permitting about that.

And please note that improvements are made steadily and will be continued for a long time.

data.short_description: Let's go battle. Just enjoy it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i5 9400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio etc.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
